data.title: Auburn Hills Property management & Home Leasing company in Auburn Hills MI
data.meta_description: JMZ Management GUARANTEES TO LEASE YOUR HOUSE OR THEY WILL PAY THE RENT until they do. Full service leasing & property management specialists.
data.text:
The city Auburn Hills Michigan is an industrious and economically diverse city strategically located between the cities of Detroit and Flint. This optimal location provides a perfect place for those who are seeking to invest in the real estate market. There are ample international companies that call the city of Auburn Hills home, and for that reason the populous continues to grow. There are currently 21,000 plus residents here in Auburn Hills and it is vitally important they find the appropriate affordable living arrangements for their needs. And if you have properties in need of tenants, you will find that hiring a property manager like the dedicated professionals at JMZ Property Management will make this process so much easier.

Auburn Hills is located north of Detroit with I-75 cutting through the city. If you’re looking for a spot with tons of shopping, dining and entertainment options and the convenience of being able to get around town then Auburn Hills is the desirable city for you. Auburn Hills is very business-friendly with twenty-two high-tech parks and is home to forty international companies.

If you’re looking for shopping options then you’ll want to check out the Great Lakes Crossing Outlet Mall. Featuring over 180 specialty stores as well as restaurants and a movie theater, this outlet mall located in the northern part of Auburn Hills is ideal for holiday shopping, upgrading your wardrobe or just a weekend night out with a loved one. When it comes to sporting events and concerts the Palace of Auburn Hills is an amazing venue and home to the Detroit Pistons.

If you’re looking to spend some time outdoors, you’ll be close to literally dozens of lakes and major parks so you can do everything from boat and swim to hunt to just take a leisurely walk or bike ride on many of the paved paths. Whether you’re looking for an ideal spot to move the family or you just want to be near many of metro Detroit’s great attractions, definitely take a look at Auburn Hills.
